attributes.action: Premiership rugby is compulsory level of club competition to play for England.
attributes.additional_details: We are calling for the government to consider stipulation that all national representation within the English rugby union do so from the highest level of domestic competition (premiership rugby). In a time of economic hardship for many there is a question as to why public finance should support unsatisfactory national level representation. English rugby is at a cross roads where by lower level representation may continue for a number of years. We believe this is unacceptable!
attributes.background: National sporting competition on all levels is in part funded by the tax payer. We do not believe that allowing players that compete on a Club level lower than the highest tier of domestic competition  in rugby union is the best use of tax payers money.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for selecting players for the England squad.
